text:
Hi folks, floating this idea here first. I’ve run cohorts for HubSpot before of small/solo HubSpot Partners working together. The last was called “*Silverpeak*” with help from Dan Tyre and David Weinstein, where the first milestone was getting everyone to Silver (when Silver existed) and beyond. Around 60 agencies went through Silverpeak in 3 cohorts.
I’ve been thinking of starting a similar group where small/solo developers work together to create and launch their first public app on HubSpot Marketplace. As that is the topic of today’s Developer HUG, I thought I’d float the idea here to see if there is interest. Thoughts?

Hey guys! What’s the most practical way to gather tester for a new marketplace app? In this case, it’s an app that helps users to automatically create personalized videos to engage with contacts within workflows.

I got 100 beta users by posting a couple post on linkedin. Describing best fit to test.

Example, someone who needs/wants to generate personalized videos via workflows for prospecting.

We’re live and <@U037QED9TR6> is rocking his session

<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EDQEYWbs3zw>
Anyone else having issues editing Marketplace listing? I just get a white screen
I did just get a random image issue with NPS surveys which was odd. I just assumed it was me.

Hey <@U03REFNRMB3> and <@U01QVR44MEY> I’d love to have you onboard in planning - Please sign up here and you’ll be added to the MyFirstApp channel. There’s 5 of us so far <https://marketplace.hubdo.com/en-US/apps/428352/>
